newsitem.title: USA: AVIC to buy interest in paging operation.
newsitem.headline: AVIC to buy interest in paging operation.

text.p: AVIC Group International Inc said Monday it has agreed in principle with Hainan Minyuan Modern Agriculture Co to acquire a majority interest in a paging operation in China with around 300,000 existing subscribers.
AVIC said this network has been operating for three years and is the dominant non-Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications paging operation in Beijing.
AVIC expects to acquire this interest in the paging operation from Beijing CATCH, a wholly owned subsidiary of Hainan Minyuan, one of the largest public companies in China.
Valuation of the assets and final terms of sale remain to be negotiated, AVIC said.
Hainan Minyuan also holds an option to acquire 45 percent of AVIC, AVIC said.
